name: GeoJam 2022 - SwitchRun
description:
SOME OF THE SCREENS MAY BE OUT OF PROPORTION. WEB VERSION IS MOST LIKELY BUGGY.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The controls are :

A, D, left arrow, right arrow-

movement left and right

W, up arrow-

jump keys

Right Shift, Left Shift-

Dash keys

Enter- 

Allows you to click where your mouse is. Useful for picking a side without moving the cursor

Esc-

Escapes back to main menu screen.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits-

Most movement and input code and logic goes to DawnosaurStudios

(Specifically this video) 

A lot of the UI and sound management is from Brackeys. The select sound effect is from 

The other sounds were made in sxfr, and the music was made in BeepBox.

DawnosaurStudios- https://www.youtube.com/c/DawnosaurStudios

Brackeys- https://www.youtube.com/c/Brackeys

Huge thanks to the Internet for helping me solve most of my issues.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How to play-

The game may be buggy and only has 5 levels. You can pick a side per level which gives you different stats and abilities as shown on the picking screen. After picking a side, a level shows up where you platform to get to the finish, a box with a weird pattern. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was developed in Unity Game Engine in 3 days. I had fun learning new techniques and Unity in general. I think the GeoJam 2022 was pretty fun in general.
